isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HUBS, BEARINGS, AND SEALS - BEARING CUP (RACE) - INSTALL

step1.para: To install inner bearing cup, place hub assembly on floor with brake drum/disc facing up (toward you).
Lube hub cup surface and outer cup surface with engine oil and place cup into hub bore in the same position as the one removed.
Using a brass drift, punch with a flat end and a hammer, and tap cup into bore. Be sure cup is not cocked.
Working around the circumference of the cup in a criss-cross pattern, drive cup into the hub bore until it is bottomed.
Clean any brass shavings from bore.
To install outer bearing cup, place hub assembly on floor with brake drum/disc facing floor and repeat steps 2 through 5 above.
